meaningMnemonic: If you have the <kanji>nature</kanji> of being <kanji>lazy</kanji> it will become a <vocabulary>habit</vocabulary>. The <vocabulary>momentum</vocabulary> created by your natural laziness will make it so you can't break out of your lazy cycle.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
